faculties.description: undertake professional work in teaching and scientific research
faculties.title: Faculties

support_centers.description: support training activities (practice), scientific research, technology transfer, and innovation
support_centers.title: Support Centers

administrative_department.name: administrative – school office department
administrative_department.role: assisting the Board of Rectors as well as supporting departments and centers in implementing professional activities
administrative_department.title: Administrative Department

organizational_structure.introduction_text: The Academy of Cryptography Techniques is a university-level educational organization directly under the Prime Minister's Office, with the mission of training high-quality human resources in cryptography and information security.

school_council.title: School Council
school_council.description: The School Council is an agency established by the decision of the Rector of the Academy of Cryptography Techniques to advise the Rector in implementing the management and operational tasks of the Academy.
